\SetAPI{J}
\section{database.pool.maxtry}
\label{configuration:DatabasePoolMaxtry}
\ClearAPI
Number of attempts ambeth should try to acquire a database instance. If the number of attempts exceeds the limit an IllegalStateException will be thrown. If the value is set to 0 Ambeth will try to get a connection until it successful retrieves one. Valid values are all numbers starting from 0, default is 1.
